name: Coral Cities
description: Massive coral formations that resemble cities create unique underwater environments and potential homes for aquatic civilizations. The complex structures provide excellent hiding places, while the coral materials can be valuable for crafting or trade.
atmosphere: Massive coral formations create underwater cities while marine life thrives in the complex structures. Coral towers and natural architecture house diverse sea creatures as valuable materials attract harvesters. Currents flow through coral canyons and passages. Natural underwater metropolis built by countless generations of coral polyps.
